---
title: "import_v1_rollouts_not_supported.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines a feature flag configuration for a system that doesn't support rollouts in version 1. It includes a single feature flag with basic properties and an unsupported rollout configuration.

## Symbols

### `version`
#### Description
Specifies the version of the configuration format being used.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| version | string | The version number of the configuration format |

### `flags`
#### Description
An array containing the feature flag definitions.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| flags | array | A list of feature flag configurations |

### `flag1`
#### Description
Defines a single feature flag with its properties.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Unique identifier for the flag |
| name | string | Human-readable name of the flag |
| description | string | Brief explanation of the flag's purpose |
| enabled | boolean | Whether the flag is currently active |
| rollouts | array | List of rollout configurations (unsupported in this version) |

### `rollouts`
#### Description
Defines rollout configurations for the feature flag, which are not supported in this version.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| description | string | Description of the rollout |
| threshold | object | Defines the rollout threshold |
| threshold.percentage | float | Percentage of users affected by the rollout |
| threshold.value | boolean | The value to be applied when the rollout is active |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| version | string | "1.0" | The version of the configuration format |
| flags[].key | string | N/A | Unique identifier for each flag |
| flags[].name | string | N/A | Human-readable name of the flag |
| flags[].description | string | N/A | Brief explanation of the flag's purpose |
| flags[].enabled | boolean | false | Whether the flag is currently active |
| flags[].rollouts[].description | string | N/A | Description of the rollout (unsupported) |
| flags[].rollouts[].threshold.percentage | float | N/A | Percentage of users affected by the rollout (unsupported) |
| flags[].rollouts[].threshold.value | boolean | N/A | The value to be applied when the rollout is active (unsupported) |

## TODOs
The filename `import_v1_rollouts_not_supported.yml` suggests that rollouts are not supported in version 1 of this configuration format. However, the file still includes a rollout configuration. This inconsistency should be addressed:

1. Remove the `rollouts` section from the flag configuration if it's truly not supported in version 1.
2. Update the filename if rollouts are actually supported in this version.
3. Add a comment or documentation explaining the presence of unsupported features in the file, if they are intentionally included for testing or future compatibility purposes.
